Articles.Content:
So heres something special for our Kavro Lankaster K.mk.1 special, the Grand Slam. I just tried to make something like it but not replicate it 100% so you can say that its more of a kspfied version of it rather than a straight up replika. This is a bit more modern than the old Grand Slam from WW2, aka this on is a remote controlled bomb (probe core,sas,controlsurfaces). The bomb is loaded with six warheads and eight MK-82 bombs to give it some real punch, but i dont think this one has even nearly the same amount of destructive power as the 22000 LBS Grand Slam had witch is still the most heavyest ordinary (not atomic or hydrogen) bomb in history.

here are some picks of it in action .

So there you have it, a little dose of destruction to lighten/darken the day. Hope you enjoy .

And i hope this gives you ideas on how to construct your own bombs, if you want to ofcourse.
This is awesome man, a great combination of stock and modded parts.
